Posts.Content: Feb 28, 2019 04:30PM scoops wrote: I'm hoping for scar tissue. I'll check back in.....hopefully soon.
Posts.Title: Doctor found a lump on friday... scoops Salamandra

Posts.Content: scoops wrote: I was in for a check up on friday. The doctor found a lump. 6 oclock on left breast, underneath. About "pea" size. I had a breast reduction in 2006 and have scar tissue in that area. She did say she thought it was scar tissue BUT she also said "this is what BC feels like!" I'm waiting for a call so I can get a mammogram. Could it really be scar tissue? I wish they would call with an appt! Help Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Doctor found a lump on friday... scoops Salamandra

Posts.Content: Mar 5, 2019 05:45PM scoops wrote: It's scar tissue!!!!! Thank you for your support.
Posts.Title: Doctor found a lump on friday... scoops Salamandra

Posts.Content: Feb 28, 2019 04:29PM scoops wrote: Thank you! Time is just moving slow! I'm going to call them today.
